designs.title: Village Crorepati Shock

elements.description: Simple village man in white kurta with shocked expression, golden glow around him

designs.gemini_prompt: Create a viral WhatsApp status image (1080x1920px) showing a simple village man in white kurta with SHOCKED expression, golden divine glow around him. Dark gradient background. Bold yellow text '₹100 CRORE!' at top. Include small village hut in background. Photorealistic style with dramatic lighting. Text overlay: 'VILLAGE BOY ₹100 CRORE!' in 92px bold font, 'Started with ₹500 SIP 20 years ago' in 56px, 'Your turn next?' in 64px red pulsing text. 100px padding all sides.
designs.enhanced_gemini_prompt: Create a viral WhatsApp status image (1080x1920px) showing a simple village man in white kurta with SHOCKED expression, golden divine glow around him. Dark gradient background. Bold yellow text '₹100 CRORE!' at top. Include small village hut in background. Photorealistic style with dramatic lighting. Text overlay: 'VILLAGE BOY ₹100 CRORE!' in 92px bold font, 'Started with ₹500 SIP 20 years ago' in 56px, 'Your turn next?' in 64px red pulsing text. 100px padding all sides. Include subtle branding: 'Shruti Petkar' in #1A73E8 color at bottom, ARN text 'ARN: ARN_SHRUTI_001' in small gray font. Professional financial advisor branding integrated seamlessly.

designs.title: F&O Reality Check

elements.description: 93 crying faces vs 7 happy faces with money

elements.text:
Still want to gamble
with your money?

designs.gemini_prompt: Create viral WhatsApp status (1080x1920px) with split-screen design. Left side RED background with '93% LOSE MONEY' in white 72px bold text and crying emoji faces. Right side GREEN background with '7% MAKE MONEY' in white 72px bold text and happy money emoji faces. Top headline 'F&O REALITY' in 84px bold white. Bottom text 'Still want to gamble with your money?' in 48px. Dramatic contrast, realistic trading floor background. 100px padding.
designs.enhanced_gemini_prompt: Create viral WhatsApp status (1080x1920px) with split-screen design. Left side RED background with '93% LOSE MONEY' in white 72px bold text and crying emoji faces. Right side GREEN background with '7% MAKE MONEY' in white 72px bold text and happy money emoji faces. Top headline 'F&O REALITY' in 84px bold white. Bottom text 'Still want to gamble with your money?' in 48px. Dramatic contrast, realistic trading floor background. 100px padding. Include subtle branding: 'Shruti Petkar' in #1A73E8 color at bottom, ARN text 'ARN: ARN_SHRUTI_001' in small gray font. Professional financial advisor branding integrated seamlessly.

designs.title: Coffee Wealth Calculator
designs.gemini_prompt: Create viral WhatsApp status (1080x1920px) showing realistic coffee cup with steam on wooden table background. Overlay equation '₹200 Coffee' in 64px white text with glowing transformation arrow pointing down to '₹67 LAKHS in 30 years!' in 84px golden text with glow effect. Bottom text 'Skip coffee. Build wealth.' in 52px green. Coffee shop ambiance with warm lighting. Mathematical wealth transformation visual. 100px padding.

designs.title: Auto Driver Success Story

elements.description: Split image: old rickshaw on left, luxury car on right

designs.gemini_prompt: Create inspiring WhatsApp status (1080x1920px) with split transformation visual: left side shows humble auto-rickshaw in black & white, right side shows luxury car in golden colors. Center headline 'AUTO DRIVER BECAME CROREPATI' in 80px golden bold text. Middle shows journey: '₹1000 monthly SIP × 25 years = ₹1.2 CRORE' in 56px white. Bottom 'If he can, YOU can!' in 64px red bold. Dramatic lighting, success story theme. 100px padding.

designs.title: Grammy Portfolio Diversification

elements.description: Golden Grammy award trophy with spotlight

designs.gemini_prompt: Create premium WhatsApp status (1080x1920px) featuring golden Grammy award trophy under dramatic spotlight on dark stage background. Headline 'GRAMMY PORTFOLIO WINS EVERY YEAR' in 76px golden bold text. Show diversification concept: 'Equity + Debt + Gold = Award-Winning Returns' in 52px white. Bottom CTA 'Build your Grammy Portfolio today!' in 56px green. Awards ceremony atmosphere with red carpet elements. 100px padding. Premium, award-winning aesthetic.
